name: One Kind - Social Trials
description:
In a strange little world you litteraly drop by and get to know the place. There are little fellows - the Mimicks - that look similar to you. But what do they do? What do they want? 

"One Kind" is all about the Mimicks and still your influence on them is limited. Can you manage to survive? Or will you decide to experiment even more with them, as they observe and mimic your actions?

Find it out yourself! Try it. Try again. Try better!

_______

This prototype is my BA project. There are still some bugs to fix and i am happy, if you let me know when you find something.
